Source: United States Census Bureau

The population counts shown in the table would most likely be used for which of the following purposes?

choices.label: The reapportionment and redistricting of the United States Senate that occurs every 10 years
The reapportionment and redistricting of the of the United States House of Representatives that occurs every 10 years
The redistricting of the electoral college that occurs every 10 years
The reapportionment of the United States Congress when members of Congress change their political party affiliation
The reapportionment of the United States Congress when members of Congress move from one state to another

content.answer: The reapportionment and redistricting of the of the United States House of Representatives that occurs every 10 years

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify the scales of analysis presented by maps, quantitative and geospatial data, images, and landscapes.
